tool_description: You can send OTP's, Marketing messages, e.t.c via WhatsApp using your own custom WhatsApp number which your customers know. This would increase trust being the message is from a familiar sender.
name: Trenalyze WhatsApp
title: Trenalyze WhatsApp

api_list.name: Send Message
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trenalyze-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com/api/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trenalyze-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trenalyze-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com/api/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trenalyze-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
